name: Beetle Ball
description:
Help this little dung beetle make the biggest ball of trash so you can show off to those annoying ants!

Mix and Game Jam submission - 2D Sidescroller version of Katamari's ball rolling mechanic.

Programming:

  • Ido Lazer
  • Nadav Sheffer

Animation:

  • Shalev Ben Elya

Art & Design:

  • Ben Goldstein

Music:

  • Tom Zilberstein
